name: Attack Spatial animals
description:
The user interface of the game has changed

This game includes many changes and also in the models and added light for better visibility of the models at night, also the main light has been changed as a whole and caused a kind of pink and red color.

The game sky has changed.

In the script of the enemies, according to the changes, if certain enemies specified in the game are killed, the keys of the game will be found and other parts will be activated.
